dsmveehw:attribute.reference.ecu.wakeUpO.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.wakeUpOverBus
dsmveehw:attribute.reference.ecu.wakeUpO.description: Sets if the WakeUp Over Bus is supported

dsmveehw:attribute.reference.rack.nbOfCo.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Rack.nbOfCols
dsmveehw:attribute.reference.rack.nbOfCo.description: The number of columns in a EERack

dsmveehw:attribute.reference.rack.nbOfRo.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Rack.nbOfRows
dsmveehw:attribute.reference.rack.nbOfRo.description: The number of rows in a EERack

dsmveehw:attribute.reference.rack.nbOfSl.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Rack.slotsPerUnit
dsmveehw:attribute.reference.rack.nbOfSl.description: The number of slots per unit in a EERack

dsmveehw:attribute.instance.eeecus.comCo.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.EEECUInstance.comConfigurationGwTimeBase
dsmveehw:attribute.instance.eeecus.comCo.description: The period between successive calls to Frame forwarding task. Unit: seconds

dsmveehw:attribute.instance.eeecus.comCo.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.EEECUInstance.comConfigurationRxTimeBase
dsmveehw:attribute.instance.eeecus.comCo.description: The period between successive calls to Frame receiving task. Unit: seconds

dsmveehw:attribute.instance.eeecus.comCo.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.EEECUInstance.comConfigurationTxTimeBase
dsmveehw:attribute.instance.eeecus.comCo.description: The period between successive calls to Frame sending task. Unit: seconds

dsmveehw:attribute.itf.subTechnology.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Interface.subTechnology
dsmveehw:attribute.itf.subTechnology.description: A sub type of link technology

dsmveehw:attribute.port.direction.description: 1 for In or 2 for Out, 3 for InOut, 4 for NoDirection, default value is 2

dsmveehw:attribute.port.flexRayLatestTx.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Port.flexRayLatestTx
dsmveehw:attribute.port.flexRayLatestTx.description: Number of the last minislot in which a frame transmission can start in the dynamic segment(Specific to FLEX RAY technology)

dsmveehw:attribute.port.isLinMasterContr.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Port.isLinMasterController
dsmveehw:attribute.port.isLinMasterContr.description: Boolean to set the LIN Controller to Master or Slave ( Specific to LIN )

dsmveehw:attribute.port.linProtocolVersi.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Port.linProtocolVersion
dsmveehw:attribute.port.linProtocolVersi.description: the protocol version of the LIN controller (Specific to LIN )

dsmveehw:attribute.port.timeBase.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Port.timeBase
dsmveehw:attribute.port.timeBase.description: a LIN cluster time unit, in milliseconds (Specific to LIN )
